episodes.title: 12. From Escaping a Cult to Empowering Women with Amber Powers
episodes.description: Amber Powers shares her journey of leaving a cult, finding her voice, and becoming an advocate for women in business. She discusses the challenges of writing a memoir and the healing process it entails. Amber also talks about her work in helping women embrace their authenticity and reach their ideal audience. The conversation explores the beliefs and ideals of cults, the behavior of cult leaders, and the importance of breaking generational trauma.  Additional Info   Amber Powers' memoir, 'Untethered: My Story of Losing My Religion to Find My Voice,' will be published on March 12th, 2024.     For those that want to stay up to date on Amber's book and personal blog - you can find me here: www.amberkpowers.com    For those that want to join Amber's FB Group of nearly 35,000 women business owners globally – do so here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/womenbusinessownerssupportingwomen    For those interested in working together with Amber, they can visit www.powersdigitalmarketing.com   Key Takeaways   Writing a memoir can be a healing process, but it also requires facing fears and being transparent about difficult experiences.    Giving women a voice and empowering them in business is crucial for breaking cycles of abuse and trauma.    Understanding the beliefs and behavior of cult leaders can shed light on the dynamics of manipulation and control. Discovering your true identity and purpose is essential for personal and professional growth.    Supporting women-owned businesses through intentional shopping can make a positive impact on communities.
